     [java] !SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.debug.core 4 5012 2004-12-14 03:14:01.132
     [java] !MESSAGE Breakpoint does not have an associated marker.
NPE in ProcessConsole.closeStreams() fixed in HEAD

Fixed NPE in AbstractSourceContainer. Added synchronization on looking up a 
source element and disposing a source lookup director (so a source locator 
can't be disposed while its looking up source).

In the latest nightly build, the only errors left are like this:

    [java] !ENTRY org.eclipse.debug.core 4 120 2005-01-11 03:02:30.321
     [java] !MESSAGE An exception occurred while dispatching debug events.
     [java] !STACK 0
     [java] java.lang.NullPointerException
     [java] 	at 
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.views.console.ProcessConsole.closeStreams
(ProcessConsole.java:364)
     [java] 	at 
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.views.console.ProcessConsole.handleDebugEvents
(ProcessConsole.java:438)
     [java] 	at org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugPlugin$EventNotifier.run
(DebugPlugin.java:1043)
     [java] 	at org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.InternalPlatform.run
(InternalPlatform.java:1007)
     [java] 	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Platform.run(Platform.java:747)
     [java] 	at org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugPlugin$EventNotifier.dispatch

(DebugPlugin.java:336)
     [java] 	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:66)


Changed synchronization in ProcessConsole to synch on dispose and close 
streams, which are being called at the same time.

traces.message: Breakpoint does not have an  associated marker.      [java]
